name: Flashcard master
description:
So you know Quizlet, right? This game is that, but anyone can participate.

In Flashcard master, you can learn any language using flashcards for memorization. Learn words, phrases, language rules, anything, it doesn't even have to be languages! 

The game is powered through .txt files, where you drag in text files specifically made for this game into the game folder to use them. That's all you have to do! Then you can jump right in.

Anyone can make a set, so whether you want to learn or want to help others to learn, anyone can play!

How to make sets: 

  1. Open a new text file
  2. Line 1 will be the first language (aka the language that you will answer in first)
  3. Line 2 will be the second language (aka the language that the game will display prompts in first)
  4. After every phase, the languages are swapped
  5. Line 3 is the number of cards, so input any number above 1 (for example, 10 or 20)
  6. Leave a space in line 4
  7. From line 5, write words in language 1 (for example, "yes", "okay", "no")
  8. Write the amount of words listed in line 3 (for example, if line 3 contains 10, then write 10 words)
  9. Leave a space after that
  10. Then start writing the same words in language 2 in order (for example, "oui", "d'accord", "non") and YOU MUST HAVE THEM IN ORDER
  11. That's it! Your set is done. If you are confused, check out the example files in the downloads section.

If you make a set, you can upload it to Google Drive and share it in the comments for everyone to see!

How to import sets: 

  1. Open Flashcard master
  2. Click 'Play!' And click on 'Open folder'
  3. Drag the text files into the folder that opens
